tags.name: Camera API:
tags.description:
Endpoints for ESL detection and camera command execution
Known limitations:
- No support for access code
- If the server crashes whiles pausing transmission, the server will resume transmission upon startup again, even if it starts within the paused interval

Level of detail in the projection of an item.

    • name
    • price
  • M includes:
    • All of S
    • itemGroup
    • department
    • presentation
    • lastUpdated
    • validFrom
    • sics
    • properties
  • L includes:
    • All of M
    • links

delete.description:
Endpoint for unlinking all labels
- Both graphical and segment labels will be removed from R3Server and CAS
- A broadcast will be sent to graphical labels to show base page
- No transmission will be made to segment labels so the displayed page will not change on segment labels
- Note: This is a not a real unlink of labels since key codes and images on the labels are not removed

delete.summary: Delete all items, and unlink all labels
delete.description:
Deletes all items and unlinks all labels in store. Use query parameter to confirm operation, as there is no undo.
Returns an id to the asynchronous delete request, which can be used to query the items-result endpoint.

delete.summary: Clean the entire BackOffice command queue and BackOffice command history
delete.description:
WARNING: This command will trigger a server restarts and clean the entire BackOffice command queue and history.
This operation cannot be undone and will discard every command still in queue and erase the current Back Office command history.
This is an advanced API that should only be used to recover from improper API usage where the queue has grown to large to be processed normally.
The client is responsible to resend any data lost. This include all type of commands - not just Item Updates.

bsWarnLevel.description: Warning when number of faulty base stations exceeds

bsErrorLevel.description: Error when number of faulty base stations exceeds

trxWarnLevel.description: Warning when number of faulty transceivers exceeds

trxErrorLevel.description: Error when number of faulty transceivers exceeds

trxThresholdWarnLevel.description: Warning when number of transceivers below threshold exceeds

trxThresholdErrorLevel.description: Error when number of transceivers below threshold exceeds

eslFailWarnLevel.description: Warning when number of failed ESLs exceeds

eslFailErrorLevel.description: Error when number of failed ESLs exceeds

roamAlertMode.description: Alert levels for ESLs in roaming based on

roamWarnLevel.description: Warning when number of ESLs in roaming exceeds

roamErrorLevel.description: Error when number of ESLs in roaming exceeds

batteryAlertMode.description: Alert levels for low battery ESLs based on

batteryWarnLevel.description: Warning when number of low battery ESLs exceeds

batteryErrorLevel.description: Error when number of low battery ESLs exceeds

ApiPublicCoreV1LabelAsicAccessCode.description: A class representing access code for label

Position.description: A representation of the position of an ESL

severity.description: The severity of the message. Affects the styling when it is displayed

startTime.description: The datetime from when the system message is valid. If not specified, the message is valid from now

endTime.description: The datetime until when the system message is valid. If not specified, the message is valid indefinitely

PlazaConnectionRequest.description: The request, containing the Pricer plaza pairing key

enableLabelSubmissions.description: Enable label data cloud submissions, default to true

enableUsageSubmissions.description: Enable usage data cloud submissions, default to true

CloudRegistrationRequest.description: Representation of a cloud registration request

enableLabelSubmissions.description: Enable label data cloud submissions, default to true

enableUsageSubmissions.description: Enable usage data cloud submissions, default to true

UpdateCameraGroupRequest.description: The request for updating the group of a camera

ApiPrivateCameraV1BroadcastCommandReques.description:
The camera command and which camera group to send it to.
Possible command values:
 - 1: Take picture
 - 2: ESL Detection

command.description: Camera command to send broadcast group

cameraGroup.description: Camera group to send command to

ApiPrivateCameraV1AddressedCommandReques.description:
The camera command and which camera(s) to send it to.
Possible command values:
 - 1: Take picture
 - 2: ESL Detection

command.description: Camera command to send to camera(s)

cameras.description: List of camera(s) to send addressed command to

results.description: Returns a mapping between barcode and success of the command

ApiPrivateCameraV1SendCameraDataToCloudR.description: The data to send to Pricer cloud

jsonBlob.description: Object containing json data later to be used by irps in position calculation.

ApiPrivateCameraV1PositionRequest.description: List of barcodes to retrieve positional data for

barcodes.description: List of barcodes to retrieve positional data for

ApiPrivateCameraV1LabelPosition.description: Contains barcode, position and a timestamp representing when the position was set for the camera ESL

ApiPrivateCameraV1StopTransmissionReques.description:
Transmission pause will timeout after this many milliseconds if not manually resumed before
The maximum value is based on the systemparameter BS_TRANSMISSION_RECOVERY_TIMEOUT_MINUTES

CameraLinkRequest.description: The request for linking a camera ESL

ApiPrivateCameraV1BroadcastEslDetectionR.description: A list of cameras to activate and a stop transmission time

cameraGroup.description: Camera group to send command to

pauseDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds that the server pauses all transmission, max 5 minutes

pauseDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the server pauses all transmission

ApiPrivateCameraV1AddressedEslDetectionR.description: A list of cameras to activate and a stop transmission time

cameras.description: List of cameras to send addressed esl detection to

pauseDuration.description: The duration in milliseconds that the server pauses all transmission, max 5 minutes

pauseDelay.description: The delay in milliseconds until the server pauses all transmission

results.description: Returns a mapping between barcode and success of the command

plIds.description: Set of plIds that the request want a barcode lookup for.

mappings.description: Returns a mapping between plId(s) and barcode(s)

ApiPrivateCoreV1LinkPropertiesRequest.description: A request for updating link properties for a label.

ApiPrivateCoreV1LinkPropertiesResponse.description: A class representing the response of updating link properties for a label

status.description:
The current status of the update link properties request
The value of the status field can be in one of the three following categories:
 * Successful: Either SUCCESS or starting with SUCCESS_
 * Pending: PENDING
 * Failed: Starting with ERROR_

ApiPrivateCoreV1LabelPropertiesRequest.description: A request for updating properties for a label.

ApiPrivateCoreV1LabelPropertiesResponse.description: A class representing the response of updating properties for a label

status.description:
The current status of the update properties request
The value of the status field can be in one of the three following categories:
 * Successful: Either SUCCESS or starting with SUCCESS_
 * Pending: PENDING
 * Failed: Starting with ERROR_

timestamps.description: List of timestamps for the transmission history, corresponding to columns in the data

types.description: Types of transmission history, corresponding to rows in the data

data.description: Grid of data, where each row corresponds to a type and each column to a timestamp

sticky.description: If the notification can be deactivated

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp representing when the item was last updated

validFrom.description: Timestamp used for scheduling a future update

ApiPublicCoreV1Link.description: A class representing a link between a label and an item

barcode.description: The barcode of the linked label

itemId.description: The id of the linked item. This field is required if linkedItemId is not specified.

linkedItemId.description: The item id or SIC actually used when linking the item. If this is specified when linking, it will be used in preference to the itemId field

displayPosition.description: The position of the item on the label. 0-based. For single item labels always equal to 0

facings.description: The number of facings for the link

source.description: Source interface that triggered the request

apiInfo.description: Extra information about the source of the request

entryTypes.description: The type of entries in the request

received.description: ISO-8601 formatted date when request was received

processingDone.description: ISO-8601 formatted date when request processing of entries was done. Or null if processing is not done.

transmissionEnd.description: ISO-8601 formatted date when last transmission related to request was done. Or null if no transmission was done.

processedEntries.description: Number of processed entries in the request

processedEntriesHavingTransmission.description: Number of processed entries in the request having transmission that is done. Entries not triggering transmission are not counted here.

processedEntriesIncludingTransmission.description: Number of processed entries in the request where also any transmission is done

totalEntries.description: Total number of entries in the request

eslsAffected.description: Number of ESLs affected by the request

eslsRoaming.description: Number of ESLs that is in roaming as a result of the request

errors.description: Number of entries in the request having errors

propertyErrors.description: Number of entries in the request having property errors

ApiPrivateCoreV1RequestStatusByDay.description: Representation of count of request entry status by day

statusByDay.description: Map of request entry count by state and date in the format yyyy-MM-dd

id.description: Unique id of a request entry

requestId.description: Id of the request which the entry belongs to

resultCode.description: The result of processing the entry

itemId.description: Id of the item the entry targets

affectedLabels.description: The labels affected by the entry

ApiPrivateCoreV1RequestEntryAffectedLabe.description: Representation of a label affected by a request entry

state.description: State of the affected label as a result of the request entry

transmissionEnd.description: End time of the transmission to the label as a result of the request entry

LabelTypeSummary.description: Returns a summary of a specific label type

LabelStateSummary.description: Returns a summary with number of labels in different states

LabelFeatureSummary.description: Returns a summary of a specific label features support

groupNames.description: Returns a list of all the camera group names in the server

barcodes.description: Returns a list of barcode(s) that is in a given camera group

ApiPublicCoreV1ItemUpdateResponse.description: A class wrapping the id of an item update request

requestId.description: The item update request id. Used as input to the item-result endpoint
